Specimen Type: Sputum, bronchial washings, bronchoalveolar lavage, pleural fluid, tissue, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), urine, other body fluids
Purpose: Molecular detection of Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex to aid in the diagnosis of tuberculosis.
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, Class II biosafety cabinet, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with sterile filtered tips
